basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Luis Sandoval. I'm a software developer and computer science student, USMC veteran seeking to pursue an opportunity with a growing organization that will utilize and enhance my software development skills. I'm skilled working with JavaScript, ReactJS, Bootstrap, HTML5, and CSS3.

projects.title: Code 301 Final Project
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: This is a webpage built using React to render images and descriptions of horned beasts. Users are able to use a form to filter the horned beasts by number of horns. Users are also able to like the beasts, and see how many likes each beast has.

projects.title: Where To?
projects.description: We built a web-site that helps users determine their next vacation destination. Our recommendations are based on a survey that the user will fill out. We compare the data from the users input against our destination data, in order to determine the destination that we will recommend to the user.
